name: Firewall
description: Network security system that monitors and controls incoming and outgoing network traffic.

name: Load Balancer
description: Distributes network or application traffic across a number of servers.

name: Encryption (TLS/SSL)
description: Encrypts data in transit to protect against interception.

name: Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA)
description: Requires two or more verification methods to gain access.
effect: Prevents unauthorized access from phishing or stolen credentials.

name: Intrusion Detection System (IDS)
description: Device or software application that monitors a network or systems for malicious activity.
effect: Alerts on suspicious activity. Draw 1 card when attacked.
